questions.question: Who is the document owner?
questions.description: Team or individual responsible for maintaining this document

questions.question: Who is preparing this document?
questions.description: Name of person creating this documentation

questions.question: What is the document version?
questions.description: Version number for document control

questions.question: What is the effective date?
questions.description: Date when this document becomes effective

questions.question: Which department owns this document?
questions.description: Identifies the department responsible for forecasting

questions.question: What is your company name?
questions.description: Used throughout the document for company-specific references

questions.question: Who approves this document?
questions.description: Person who approves this forecasting documentation

questions.question: What revenue types do you forecast?
questions.description: Types of revenue your company needs to forecast

questions.question: Which expense categories do you forecast?
questions.description: Categories of expenses to include in forecasts

questions.question: What time horizons do you forecast?
questions.description: Time periods covered by your forecasting models

questions.question: What inputs do you use for revenue forecasting?
questions.description: Data sources and inputs for revenue forecasting

questions.question: What inputs do you use for expense forecasting?
questions.description: Data sources and inputs for expense forecasting

questions.question: What inputs do you use for headcount forecasting?
questions.description: Data sources and inputs for workforce planning

questions.question: What are the specific objectives of this forecasting document for your organization?
questions.description: Custom objectives beyond the standard template
questions.placeholder: Standardize forecasting approaches, support data-driven decisions, enable scenario analysis...

questions.question: Which SaaS metrics do you track and how are they calculated?
questions.description: Define your SaaS metrics and their formulas

questions.question: What are your key forecasting assumptions?
questions.description: Core assumptions that drive your forecasting models
questions.placeholder: Market growth rates, customer behavior, economic conditions...

questions.question: What business constraints affect your forecasts?
questions.description: Limitations that impact forecasting accuracy
questions.placeholder: Budget limits, resource availability, regulatory requirements...

questions.question: How often is this document reviewed?
questions.description: Frequency of document review and updates

questions.question: What triggers updates to this document?
questions.description: Events that require document revision
questions.placeholder: Model changes, new metrics, process improvements...

questions.question: What metrics do you report and monitor?
questions.description: Define your reporting cadence and ownership
